abilities.name: Explosive Flask
abilities.description: Throws an fiery flask that explodes for 300 damage.

abilities.name: Evil Mojo
abilities.description: Pip launches an experimental flask, turning all enemies into chickens for 4s.

abilities.name: Healing Potion
abilities.description: Throw a healing potion that heals teammates when it explodes.

abilities.name: Weightless
abilities.description: Jump higher for 3s. Removes all debuffs on use.

abilities.name: Potion Launcher
abilities.description: A custom launcher that fires volatile potions that explode in an area on impact.
